statements: DELETE FROM parent_feedback WHERE parent_name = 'John Doe' AND school_program = 'Summer Camp';
DELETE FROM parent_feedback WHERE parent_name = 'John Smith' AND rating > 3;
DELETE FROM educators WHERE years_of_experience > 5 AND feedback_id IN (SELECT id FROM feedback WHERE program_rating > 3);
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 AND parent_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM educators WHERE educator_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM ParentsFeedback WHERE rating > 3 AND parent_name = 'John Doe';
